int ServerUMS::init ( int  vishnuId,
int  dbType,
std::string  dbHost,
std::string  dbUsername,
std::string  dbPassword,
std::string  sendmailScriptPath 
)

To initialize the UMS server.

Parameters:
vishnuId The password of the root user vishnu_user for the connection with the database
dbType The type of the database (POSTGREDB|ORACLEDB)
dbHost The host of the database server
dbUsername The name of the database user on the server
dbPassword The password of the database user on the server
sendmailScriptPath The path to the script for sending emails
Returns:
an error code (0 if success and 1 if an error occurs)
